data.eml:eml: Description of two new species of Tonnoira Enderlein from caves in the Brazilian Amazon and comments about the taxonomic status of Tonnoira plumaria Quate (Diptera, Psychodidae, Psychodinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bravo, Freddy, Chagas, Cinthia, Alves, Veracilda Ribeiro (2008): Description of two new species of Tonnoira Enderlein from caves in the Brazilian Amazon and comments about the taxonomic status of Tonnoira plumaria Quate (Diptera, Psychodidae, Psychodinae). Zootaxa 1916: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184612
